item.title: Check this plz
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

[code]public void appendToDupe(String player) {

	BufferedWriter bw = null;

	try {
		bw = new BufferedWriter(
		new FileWriter("./config/bans.txt", true));
		bw.write(player);
		bw.newLine();
		bw.flush();
	} catch (IOException ioe) {
		ioe.printStackTrace();
	} finally {
		if (bw != null) {
			try {
				bw.close();
			} catch (IOException ioe2) {
				sM("Error with dupers!");
			}
		}
	}

}
public boolean appendIPBanned() {
writeLog(playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
disconnected = true;
return true;
}

public void checkDupe() {
	if (playerRights >= 1)
		return;
	if (playerHasItem(36, 5) || playerHasItem(995, 1000000000)) {
		appendToDupe(playerName);
	}
	if (playerCheckBank(36, 5) || playerCheckBank(995, 1000000000)) {
		appendToDupe(playerName);
	}
}[/code]

Does this ban people with exactly 1b or 5 ags’s ooooorr if they have 5+ or 1b+

Read full topic
